text: int count ( long long int [ 100000 ] , long long int ) ; int fact ( int ) ; int main ( ) { long long int a [ 100000 ] ; long long int size ; int t , i ; long long c ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & size ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; c = count ( a , size ) ; printf ( "%lld\n" , c ) ; } return 0 ; } int count ( long long int a [ 100000 ] , long long int n ) { int i , count = 1 ; long long sum = 0 ; if ( n == 1 ) return 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] > a [ i ] ) { count ++ ; } else if ( count == 1 ) { sum = sum + 1 ; count = 1 ; } else { sum = sum + ( fact ( count ) / ( 2 * fact ( count - 2 ) ) ) + count ; count = 1 ; } } return sum ; } int fact ( int n ) { int i = 1 ; while ( n != 0 ) { i = i * n ; n -- ; } return i ; }
